hero.heading: Elevate Your Skills with Adaptive AI Learning
hero.subheading: Stop wasting time on one-size-fits-all courses. Our AI Tutor adapts to your pace, style, and goals in real-time, creating a curriculum that evolves with you.

features.title: Adaptive Learning Paths
features.description: No two learners are alike. Our system constantly analyzes performance to adjust the curriculum difficulty and format in real-time, ensuring you're always challenged but never overwhelmed.

features.title: Instant AI Feedback
features.description: Don't wait for grades. Get immediate, detailed feedback on quizzes, code submissions, and written assignments from our advanced AI Tutor models.

testimonials.name: Alex Johnson
testimonials.quote: The adaptive learning path is a game changer. I learned Python in half the time it took me on other platforms because it skipped what I already knew.

testimonials.name: Maria Garcia
testimonials.quote: Our entire team uses AI-TECH PRO. The analytics dashboard helps me identify skill gaps in my department instantly. Highly recommended for enterprises.

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.quote: I was skeptical about AI tutors, but the explanations are surprisingly human-like and accurate. It's like having a professor on call 24/7.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Start for free, upgrade as you grow.

plans.name: Pro Learner
plans.description: For serious learners needing full access.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate your learning?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals mastering new skills with the power of AI.

footer.description: Empowering the workforce of tomorrow with AI-driven personalized education. Learn smarter, not harder.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 AI-TECH PRO Inc. All rights reserved.
